message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"to take or hold something","sentence":"我拿杯子。","image_prompt":"A young person in an apocalypse-soft style animation is gently holding a simple cup with one hand. The background hints at gentle decay and soft, muted colors, conveying a calm end-of-world vibe. Everything appears slightly dreamy and artistic, focusing on the hand holding the cup.","sentence_translation":"I take (hold) the cup."}
